data.quote: Always be yourself. Unless you can be a unicorn, then always be a unicorn.
data.author: Elle Lothlorien

data.quote: We do not need magic to change the world, we carry all the power we need inside ourselves already: we have the power to imagine better.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: I learned compassion from being discriminated against. Everything bad that’s ever happened to me has taught me compassion.
data.author: Ellen DeGeneres

data.quote: And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.
data.author: Elizabeth Appell

data.quote: It’s not the absence of fear, it’s overcoming it. Sometimes you’ve got to blast through and have faith.
data.author: Emma Watson

data.quote: I try to live in a little bit of my own joy and not let people steal it or take it.
data.author: Hoda Kotb

data.quote: I need to listen well so that I hear what is not said.
data.author: Thuli Madonsela

data.quote: Whenever you are blue or lonely or stricken by some humiliating thing you did, the cure and the hope is in caring about other people.
data.author: Diane Sawyer

data.quote: Dying seems less sad than having lived too little.
data.author: Gloria Steinem

data.quote: Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you’re really a yawn if it goes.
data.author: Bette Midler

data.quote: The challenge is not to be perfect...it’s to be whole.
data.author: Jane Fonda

data.quote: If you just set out to be liked, you would be prepared to compromise on anything at any time, and you would achieve nothing.
data.author: Margaret Thatcher

data.quote: You can’t be that kid standing at the top of the waterslide, overthinking it. You have to go down the chute.
data.author: Tina Fey

data.quote: Do not let what you think they think of you make you stop and question everything you are.
data.author: Carrie Fisher

data.quote: When you embrace your difference, your DNA, your look or heritage or religion or your unusual name, that’s when you start to shine.
data.author: Bethenny Frankel

data.quote: Owning our story can be hard but not nearly as difficult as spending our lives running from it.
data.author: Brene Brown

data.quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
data.author: Nora Ephron

data.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart
